scripts.setup: npm install && npm run build && npm run bootstrap
scripts.postinstall: npm run bootstrap && npm run docs:install && node .scripts/copy.script.js
scripts.build: npm run icons:build && npm run lib:build && npm run table:build && npm run vue:build && npm run angular:build && npm run react:build && npm run testing:build
scripts.lib:build: node .scripts/banner.js lib:build && npm --prefix packages/components run build
scripts.lib:serve: node .scripts/banner.js lib:serve && npm --prefix packages/components run serve
scripts.lib:test: node .scripts/banner.js lib:test && cd packages/components && npm run test
scripts.table:build: node .scripts/banner.js table:build && npm --prefix packages/components-table run build
scripts.vue:build: node .scripts/banner.js vue:build && npm --prefix packages/components-vue run build
scripts.angular:build: node .scripts/banner.js angular:build && npm --prefix packages/components-angular run build
scripts.react:build: node .scripts/banner.js react:build && npm --prefix packages/components-react run build
scripts.testing:test: node .scripts/banner.js testing:run && npm --prefix packages/testing run ci
scripts.testing:serve: node .scripts/banner.js testing:serve && npm --prefix packages/testing run serve
scripts.testing:server: node .scripts/banner.js testing:server && npm --prefix packages/testing run ci:server
scripts.testing:build: node .scripts/banner.js testing:build && npm --prefix packages/testing run build
scripts.icons:build: node .scripts/banner.js icons:build && npm --prefix packages/icons run build
scripts.docs:setup: npm --prefix packages/fonts run docs && npm --prefix packages/icons run docs && npm --prefix packages/components run docs && npm --prefix packages/testing run docs && npm --prefix docs run setup
scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:setup && npm --prefix docs run build
scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:install && npm run docs:build
scripts.sandbox:build: node .scripts/banner.js sandbox:build && npm run icons:build && npm --prefix packages/components run docs:sandbox && node .scripts/sandbox.script.js
